short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access to your data in 2 clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EZAccess helps you save and access data that you would use frequently such as your email, LinkedIn, Twitter, portfolio, etc.

Steps:
1. Install the extension
2. Add your links
3. Access the data you want

Note: All your data is stored locally on your browser.
